author: Techno Tim
description:
Proxmox 9.1 adds support for OCI container images, bringing Docker-style workloads to Proxmox through LXC. In this video, I show how it works, how to deploy OCI images like Grafana, and what limitations still exist in this tech preview. Is it ready for your homelab?

01:37 - Demo: Using OCI Images
title: OCI Image Support in Proxmox: A First Look (And Some Gotchas)
